permissions: Allowed for admins. Non-admin users can create a request when the requested user shares broker, customer, trucker, or material supplier membership relationships with the requester.
side_effects: Creates a user location request and triggers a user location request notification to the user.
validation_notes: --user is required. Server rejects multiple requests for the same user within 5 minutes.

flags.name: --user
flags.description: User ID to request location from (required, example: 123)
